title: The works of John Knox;
author: Knox, John
snippet: 7 In MS. G, " Audistoun." The pro perty of Addiston is in the parish of Ratho. It now belongs to the Earl of Morton ; but the old house, situated on an elevated terrace, was pulled down a few years ago.

title: The Comfort of Saturdays
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: That was as much as she heard before she drifted back to sleep, and when she finally got out of bed at nine, the house was empty. The canal towpath was a good place to push Charlie in the new three-wheeled jogging pushchair that they had recently acquired; they could go for miles, to Ratho if they wished, and beyond. Isabel went downstairs in her dressing gown and opened the shutters in her study.
